Html:
Im using GetPlayers() for arma3 and it is working fine up until it starts to return over around 50-60 players. Is someone able to look into this for me please? I have tried it on multiple servers and it definitely seems to only return null when there is a request for a large amount of players.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Cheers,

hi catbert90,
It seems to be a server side problem.
when player count goes above around 75, server does not respond to Player query message.
I couldn't get any information on this.
